about_the_game:
Embark on a solar-punk adventure in a wholly unique way - planting alien flowers in the wreckage of a crashed spaceship. The way plants and tech combine form an engaging puzzle system unlike any you have seen before. Strategic use of multiple characters, resource management and your own ingenuity are key to navigating this vibrant, cozy, non-violent adventure.

On a distant world, a derelict starship has lain dormant for aeons. But as roots sprout from an alien seed pod, and burrow deep into the craft's exposed wiring, a short circuit sends a burst of energy into nearby maintenance robot Sp1k-E. 

Awoken from interminable slumber and infused with the life force of alien flora, Sp1k-E sees new possibilities in cultivating a garden within the wreckage.

Each combination of flower and tech yields different results. Use Sp1k-E’s sensors to find planting sites. Observe how the roots interact with the circuitry below. Tend your plants to achieve balance and breathe new life into ancient systems.

Hone your skills to repair life support and awaken ”the little astronaut”. Revive other robots to assist in your work. Fashion useful components from junk and vegetation. Repair and upgrade a shuttle craft, and prepare for a voyage home.

short_description: A 3rd person cozy sci-fi puzzle adventure, where you playfully combine alien plants with broken tech - this is the art of Shorticulture! Repair a shuttle using only space junk and vegetation. Manage multiple characters and resources. Solve puzzles. And help a lost astronaut to return home.
